GapFillInput.Title: Present simple passive
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets ( ) into the Present simple passive.

Content.Question:
1. Football is watched (watch) by more people than any other sport in the world.
2. More personal telephone calls are made (make) on Mother's Day than any other day.
3. Seven times more men than women are killed (kill) by lightning in storms.
4. Wine is sold (sell) in coloured bottles because it can lose its taste if it's in the light.
5. Every day, up to forty hairs are lost (lose) from men's heads.
6. France, a country of 60 million people, is visited (visit) by 60 million people a year.
7. About $17 billion is spent (spend) on pet food in the USA every year.
8. 1,000 cigarettes are produced (produce) each year for every man, woman and child in the world.
